mapper.select: SELECT d.PRODUCT_CODE, d.CONTENT, d.IMAGE_LINK, d.IMAGE_CNT, d.LIKES, d.VIEWS, CONCAT(tl.LOCATION_SI_NM, ' ' , tl.LOCATION_GU_NM, ' ' , tl.LOCATION_DONG_NM), p.CATEGORY, p.TITLE, p.THUMBNAIL, p.PRODUCT_STATUS, p.MCOIN, p.REQ_CNT, p.INSERT_DATE, p.UPDATE_DATE, p.USER_CODE FROM TB_PRODUCT p JOIN TB_PRODUCT_DETAIL d ON p.PRODUCT_CODE = d.PRODUCT_CODE JOIN TB_LOCATION_TEMP tl ON tl.LOCATION_DONG_CD = p.LOCATION_DONG_CD WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_DETAIL (PRODUCT_CODE, USER_CODE, CONTENT, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{productCode}, #{userCode}, #{content}, #{insertDate}, #{updateDate})

INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT (USER_CODE, LOCATION_DONG_CD, CATEGORY, TITLE, THUMBNAIL, PRODUCT_STATUS, MCOIN, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{locationDongCd}, #{category}, #{title}, #{thumbnail}, #{productStatus}, #{mcoin}, #{insertDate}, #{updateDate})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
